overview: Investigative reporter Clea infiltrates the 1-800-Phone-Sex offices in hopes of uncovering their connection to the local police . She sees police cars parked outside of the building at all hours of the day, but they never seems to respond to noise complaints from the building's more conservative tenants. When Clea runs into Lela, the new manager of 1-800-Phone-Sex, in the hallway, she is mistaken for a job applicant - the perfect in. Within moments, Clea is given a choice - fuck a stranger to keep her cover, or chicken out and pass on what might just be the scoop of a lifetime.
title: 1-800PhoneSEX-3
